column1: The Valmaric script is an early script which J.R.R. Tolkien used from about 1922 to 1925 and looks like a midpoint between the Sarati and the Tengwar; Tolkien experimented with several similar scripts but Valmaric is the only one published so far.
He referred to those scripts as "Qenya writing"
